UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Stores profile information for each user of the EltaBlue platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

userId.description: Unique identifier from external authentication provider.

role.description: The user's role within the platform (e.g., Project Developer, Verifier, Investor, Regulator).

lastLogin.description: Timestamp of the user's last login.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a blue carbon project registered on the EltaBlue platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Project entity.

type.description: The type of blue carbon project (e.g., Mangrove Restoration, Seagrass Conservation).

location.description: Geographic location of the project (coordinates or region).

targetTCO2e.description: Estimated carbon offset target for the project (in tonnes of CO2 equivalent).

developerId.description: Reference to UserProfile representing the project developer. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N Project)

status.description: The status of the project (e.g., Active, Pending, Completed).

MRVReport.title: MRVReport
MRVReport.description: Measurement, Reporting, and Verification (MRV) reports submitted for carbon projects.

id.description: Unique identifier for the MRVReport entity.

projectId.description: Reference to Project the MRV report belongs to. (Relationship: Project 1:N MRVReport)

submissionDate.description: Date when the MRV report was submitted.

carbonData.description: JSON data containing the measured carbon data from the MRV process.

verifierId.description: Reference to UserProfile that verified the MRV Report (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N MRVReport)

status.description: The status of the MRV report (e.g., Submitted, Verified, Rejected).

CarbonCredit.title: CarbonCredit
CarbonCredit.description: Represents a tokenized carbon credit generated from a verified MRV report.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CarbonCredit entity.

mrvReportId.description: Reference to MRVReport associated with the creation of the credit. (Relationship: MRVReport 1:N CarbonCredit)

issuanceDate.description: Date the carbon credit was issued.

amount.description: The amount of carbon offset represented by the credit (in tonnes of CO2 equivalent).

ownerId.description: Reference to UserProfile that currently owns the credit. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N CarbonCredit)

retirementDate.description: Date the carbon credit was retired (if applicable).

price.description: The current market price of the carbon credit.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Contact entity.

firstName.description: The first name of the person submitting the form.

lastName.description: The last name of the person submitting the form.

email.description: The email address of the person submitting the form.

message.description: The message submitted in the form.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the form was submitted.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores profile information for each user.

/projects/{projectId}/mrv_reports/{mrvRe.description: MRV reports for a specific project.
